    • KitBot

      public KitBot(String name, DriverStation.Alliance alliance)
      A SmartOpponent for FRC Reefscape.
      Parameters:
      name - the opponent name. Typically just "SuperKitBot 1". Names should not be the same.
      alliance - the opponents DriverStation.Alliance.
